question:
As per India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2017, which of the following has/have shown a decline in area in comparison to assessment made in 2015?
  1. Very dense forest
  2. Moderately dense forest
  3. Open forest
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: As per India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2017, the category of moderately dense forest has shown a decline of .21% in comparison to assessment made in 2015. The categories of Very Dense Forest and Open Forest have shown an increase by .73% and .04%.
